Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check_api, user_account:Checkin, credit_debit:credit
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Credit,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : I want to use Credit account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : Matteo is the person you are looking for
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Matteo
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, list_of_destination_names:Marco,Samuel,Simone,Tahir,Vevake
Bot : The recipient you provided is not registered, available list of recipients are : Marco,Samuel,Simone,Tahir,Vevake, would you like to change ?
User : accept
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : I want it for Marco
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Marco
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Credit, credit_debit:credit, destination_name:Marco
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:success
Bot : end_call api_call successful !!

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I would like to see my credit transaction history
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check_api, credit_debit:credit
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'one or more slots are faulty'
Bot : api_call:credit_debit_check_api, credit_debit:credit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available options : debit'
Bot : It seems that you can't access that option, available options are : debit, would you like to change ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call you denied to change the option

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I would like to see my transaction history from Credit to Simone
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check_api, user_account:Credit, destination_name:Simone
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'one or more slots are faulty'
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of user accounts : Checkin,Savings'
Bot : It seem's that user account you provided is invalid, your available user accounts are : Checkin,Savings, would you like to change ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Go for Checkin
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_destination_name_api, destination_name:Simone
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, list_of_destination_names:Matteo,Serra,Vevake
Bot : The recipient you provided is not registered, available list of recipients are : Matteo,Serra,Vevake, would you like to change ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call User denied to change destination name

User : <SILENCE>

Bot : from which account ?
User : I select Credit
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'availbale list of user accounts : Checkin,Savings'

User : reject
Bot : end_call You denied to change the account

Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?
User : Go for debit
Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:debit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Credit, credit_debit:debit, destination_name:Simone
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:success
Bot : end_call api_call successful !!

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Can you display my account balance ?
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_accounts_api, list_of_accounts:Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Prefer Credit account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of accounts : Savings'
Bot : It seems that you have not entered a valid account, you available accounts are Savings, would you like change the source account ?
User : accept
Bot : which account do you want to check ?
User : How about my Savings account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_balance_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response api_response:account_balance_api, api_result:success, balance:1300
Bot : end_call your current balance for account is 1300

Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 1000 and your current balance is 3000 so the maximum you can transfer is 1000, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call Rejected to change the decision

Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : what is the amount ?
User : It is 9000
Bot : api_call:check_amount, user_account:Savings, amount:9000
API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:1000,balance:3000,max_transferable_amt:1000, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'
Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 1000 and your current balance is 3000 so the maximum you can transfer is 1000, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : accept
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Savings, destination_name:Serra, amount:1000
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:success
Bot : end_call transaction conducted successfully, ciao !!

API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_destination_name_api, destination_name:Tahir
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, list_of_destination_names:Marco,Matteo,Samuel,Sourabh,Vevake
Bot : The recipient you provided is not registered, available list of recipients are : Marco,Matteo,Samuel,Sourabh,Vevake, would you like to change ?
User : accept
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : It is Sourabh
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Sourabh
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : request for name
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : I want to use Savings account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?
User : Go for credit
Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:credit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Savings, credit_debit:credit, destination_name:Sourabh
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:failed
Bot : end_call error in processing request !!

User : Send Money
Bot : from which account ?
User : use the Checkin for the transaction

API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Simone is the recipient
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Simone
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of names :Marco,Matteo,Samuel,Serra,Sourabh,Tahir'
Bot : The recipient you are trying to provide doesn't exist, available list of recipients is Marco,Matteo,Samuel,Serra,Sourabh,Tahir, would you like to change the recipient ?
User : accept
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Sourabh is the receiver
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Sourabh
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : what is the amount ?
User : 9000 euros
Bot : api_call:check_amount, user_account:Checkin, amount:9000
API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:1000,balance:8000,max_transferable_amt:1000, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'
Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 1000 and your current balance is 8000 so the maximum you can transfer is 1000, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call Rejected to change the decision

Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?
User : credit please
Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:credit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : I want it for Sourabh
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Sourabh
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Checkin, credit_debit:credit, destination_name:Sourabh
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:success
Bot : end_call api_call successful !!

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Could you please transfer 800 to Matteo

API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : from which account ?
User : use the Credit for the transaction
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:amount_check_api, user_account:Credit, amount:800
API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:1000,balance:400,max_transferable_amt:400, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'
Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 1000 and your current balance is 400 so the maximum you can transfer is 400, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : accept
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Credit, destination_name:Matteo, amount:400
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:success
Bot : end_call transaction conducted successfully, ciao !!

User : reject
Bot : end_call Denied to change account

Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Matteo
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, list_of_destination_names:Tahir
Bot : The recipient you provided is not registered, available list of recipients are : Tahir, would you like to change ?
User : accept
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : Samuel is the person you are looking for
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Samuel
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, list_of_destination_names:Tahir
Bot : The recipient you provided is not registered, available list of recipients are : Tahir, would you like to change ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call User denied to change destination name

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I would like to know the amount of money with me right now.
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_accounts_api, list_of_accounts:Checkin,Credit,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Please select my Credit account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_balance_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response api_response:account_balance_api, api_result:success, balance:1300
Bot : end_call your current balance for account is 1300

Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Credit,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Please use Savings account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?
User : prefer to use debit
Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:debit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : Tahir is the person you are looking for
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Tahir
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Savings, credit_debit:debit, destination_name:Tahir
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:success
Bot : end_call api_call successful !!

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I want to transfer money from my Checkin to Simone

Bot : what is the amount ?
User : 9000 is the total
Bot : api_call:check_amount, user_account:Checkin, amount:9000
API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:1000,balance:400,max_transferable_amt:400, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'
Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 1000 and your current balance is 400 so the maximum you can transfer is 400, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call Rejected to change the decision

Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 2000 and your current balance is 1300 so the maximum you can transfer is 1300, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call Rejected to change the decision

Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, user_account:Credit, amount:800
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Tahir is the recipient
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Tahir
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of names :Marco,Matteo,Samuel,Vevake'
Bot : The recipient you are trying to provide doesn't exist, available list of recipients is Marco,Matteo,Samuel,Vevake, would you like to change the recipient ?
User : accept
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Send it to the account of Simone
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Simone
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of names :Marco,Matteo,Samuel,Vevake'
Bot : The recipient you are trying to provide doesn't exist, available list of recipients is Marco,Matteo,Samuel,Vevake, would you like to change the recipient ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call User failed to change the account

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Can you transfer 9000 from my Checkin to Matteo
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, user_account:Checkin, destination_name:Matteo, amount:9000
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'one or more slots are faulty'
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'availbale list of user accounts : Savings'
Bot : It seems that you have not entered a valid account, you available accounts are Savings, would you like change the source account ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call You denied to change the account

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I would like to see my credit transaction history
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check_api, credit_debit:credit
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Credit
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit , which one do you wish ?
User : Go for Checkin
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : It is Matteo
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Matteo
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Checkin, credit_debit:credit, destination_name:Matteo
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:success
Bot : end_call api_call successful !!

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Please Transfer money
Bot : from which account ?
User : from my Savings
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Send this money to Matteo
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Matteo
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of names :Samuel,Serra,Simone,Sourabh,Tahir,Vevake'
Bot : The recipient you are trying to provide doesn't exist, available list of recipients is Samuel,Serra,Simone,Sourabh,Tahir,Vevake, would you like to change the recipient ?
User : accept
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Send this money to Marco
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Marco
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of names :Samuel,Serra,Simone,Sourabh,Tahir,Vevake'
Bot : The recipient you are trying to provide doesn't exist, available list of recipients is Samuel,Serra,Simone,Sourabh,Tahir,Vevake, would you like to change the recipient ?
User : accept
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Send it to the account of Sourabh
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Sourabh
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : what is the amount ?
User : 200 is the total
Bot : api_call:check_amount, user_account:Savings, amount:200
API : api_response:amount_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call User refused to confirm transaction

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I would like to see my debit transaction history from Savings
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check_api, user_account:Savings, credit_debit:debit
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'one or more slots are faulty'
Bot : api_call:credit_debit_check_api, credit_debit:debit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available options : credit'
Bot : It seems that you can't access that option, available options are : credit, would you like to change ?
User : accept
Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?
User : credit please
Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:credit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:credit_debit_check_api, credit_debit:debit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : request for name
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Credit,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Please use Credit account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : Samuel is the person
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Samuel
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Credit, credit_debit:credit, destination_name:Samuel
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:success
Bot : end_call api_call successful !!

User : The money is for Vevake

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I want to transfer money from my Credit to Samuel
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, user_account:Credit, destination_name:Samuel
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : what is the amount ?
User : It is 2400
Bot : api_call:check_amount, user_account:Credit, amount:2400
API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:1000,balance:8000,max_transferable_amt:1000, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'
Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 1000 and your current balance is 8000 so the maximum you can transfer is 1000, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : accept
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Credit, destination_name:Samuel, amount:1000
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:failed
Bot : end_call error in processing transaction

Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_accounts_api, list_of_accounts:Checkin,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : How about my Credit account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of accounts : Checkin,Savings'
Bot : It seems that you have not entered a valid account, you available accounts are Checkin,Savings, would you like change the source account ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call Denied to change account

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Can you display my account balance ?
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_accounts_api, list_of_accounts:Checkin,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Prefer Savings account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_balance_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response api_response:account_balance_api, api_result:failed
Bot : end_call error in processing request !!

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Can I see my Savings account balance
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, user_account:Savings
API : api_response api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_balance_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response api_response:account_balance_api, api_result:success, balance:400
Bot : end_call your current balance for account is 400

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Show me my account balance
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_accounts_api, list_of_accounts:Checkin
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin , which one do you wish ?
User : Please select my Savings account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of accounts : Checkin'
Bot : It seems that you have not entered a valid account, you available accounts are Checkin, would you like change the source account ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call Denied to change account

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Please transfer 1600 from my Checkin
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, user_account:Checkin, amount:1600
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'one or more slots are faulty'
Bot : api_call:amount_check_api, user_account:Checkin, amount:1600
API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:5000,balance:1300,max_transferable_amt:1300, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'
Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 5000 and your current balance is 1300 so the maximum you can transfer is 1300, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : accept
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Tahir is the recipient
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Tahir
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call User refused to confirm transaction

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Please Transfer money
Bot : from which account ?
User : take money from Checkin
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Tahir is the receiver
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Tahir
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : what is the amount ?
User : 1600 is the total
Bot : api_call:check_amount, user_account:Checkin, amount:1600
API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:1000,balance:3000,max_transferable_amt:1000, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'
Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 1000 and your current balance is 3000 so the maximum you can transfer is 1000, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : accept
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Checkin, destination_name:Tahir, amount:1000
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:failed
Bot : end_call error in processing transaction

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I would like to see my debit transaction history from Checkin to Sourabh
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check_api, user_account:Checkin, credit_debit:debit, destination_name:Sourabh
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'one or more slots are faulty'
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of user accounts : Savings'
Bot : It seem's that user account you provided is invalid, your available user accounts are : Savings, would you like to change ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : I would like Savings account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Go for Savings
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Savings, credit_debit:debit, destination_name:Sourabh
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:failed
Bot : end_call error in processing request !!

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I would like to see my credit transaction history from Checkin
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check_api, user_account:Checkin, credit_debit:credit
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin , which one do you wish ?
User : I would like Checkin account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : It is Serra
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Serra
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, list_of_destination_names:Marco,Matteo,Samuel,Simone,Sourabh,Vevake
Bot : The recipient you provided is not registered, available list of recipients are : Marco,Matteo,Samuel,Simone,Sourabh,Vevake, would you like to change ?
User : accept
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : It is Simone
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Simone
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Checkin, credit_debit:credit, destination_name:Simone
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:failed
Bot : end_call error in processing request !!

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I want to transfer money from my Savings to Tahir
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, user_account:Savings, destination_name:Tahir
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'one or more slots are faulty'
Bot : api_call:destination_name_check_api, destination_name:Tahir
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of names :Marco,Matteo,Samuel,Serra'
Bot : The recipient you are trying to provide doesn't exist, available list of recipients is Marco,Matteo,Samuel,Serra, would you like to change the recipient ?
User : accept
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Send it to the account of Matteo
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Matteo
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : what is the amount ?
User : 1200 is the total
Bot : api_call:check_amount, user_account:Savings, amount:1200
API : api_response:amount_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Savings, destination_name:Matteo, amount:1200
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:success
Bot : end_call transaction conducted successfully, ciao !!

Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I would like to make a money transaction
Bot : from which account ?
User : use the Checkin for the transaction
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'availbale list of user accounts : Credit,Savings'
Bot : It seems that you have not entered a valid account, you available accounts are Credit,Savings, would you like change the source account ?
User : accept
Bot : from which account ?
User : Prefer the Credit
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Serra is the receiver
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Serra
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : what is the amount ?
User : It is 4500
Bot : api_call:check_amount, user_account:Credit, amount:4500
API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:5000,balance:1300,max_transferable_amt:1300, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'
Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 5000 and your current balance is 1300 so the maximum you can transfer is 1300, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call Rejected to change the decision

Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_balance_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response api_response:account_balance_api, api_result:success, balance:3000
Bot : end_call your current balance for account is 3000

API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available options : credit'

Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'user_account is incorrect'
Bot : api_call:check_account_api user_account:Credit
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of accounts : Checkin'
Bot : It seems that you have not entered a valid account, you available accounts are Checkin, would you like change the source account ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call Denied to change account

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Transfer 800
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, amount:800
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : from which account ?
User : from my Credit
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'availbale list of user accounts : Savings'
Bot : It seems that you have not entered a valid account, you available accounts are Savings, would you like change the source account ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call You denied to change the account

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I would like to know the amount of money with me right now.
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_accounts_api, list_of_accounts:Credit
Bot : You have the following accounts : Credit , which one do you wish ?
User : Prefer Checkin account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of accounts : Credit'
Bot : It seems that you have not entered a valid account, you available accounts are Credit, would you like change the source account ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call Denied to change account

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Can I see my transaction history ?
Bot : api_call:request_accounts_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Credit,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Please use Credit account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Credit,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Savings account please
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?
User : Go for debit
Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:debit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : Please use Sourabh
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Sourabh
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Savings, credit_debit:debit, destination_name:Sourabh
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:success
Bot : end_call api_call successful !!

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Transfer 4500
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, amount:4500
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : from which account ?
User : Prefer the Checkin
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:amount_check_api, user_account:Checkin, amount:4500
API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:2000,balance:8000,max_transferable_amt:2000, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'
Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 2000 and your current balance is 8000 so the maximum you can transfer is 2000, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : accept
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Serra is the receiver
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Serra
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call User refused to confirm transaction

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Can I see my transaction history ?
Bot : api_call:request_accounts_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : I want to use Savings account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Please use Savings account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?
User : Go for debit
Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:debit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available options : credit'
Bot : It seems that you can't access that option, available options are : credit, would you like to change ?
User : accept
Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?
User : Go for credit
Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:credit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : Tahir is the person
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Tahir
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Savings, credit_debit:credit, destination_name:Tahir
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:success
Bot : end_call api_call successful !!

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Could you please transfer 200 to Sourabh
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, destination_name:Sourabh, amount:200
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : from which account ?
User : I select Checkin
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:amount_check_api, user_account:Checkin, amount:200
API : api_response:amount_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Checkin, destination_name:Sourabh, amount:200
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:failed
Bot : end_call error in processing transaction

Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Please select my Savings account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_balance_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response api_response:account_balance_api, api_result:success, balance:1300
Bot : end_call your current balance for account is 1300

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Send money to Serra
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, destination_name:Serra
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'one or more slots are faulty'
Bot : api_call:destination_name_check_api, destination_name:Serra
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of names :Marco,Matteo,Samuel,Simone'
Bot : The recipient you are trying to provide doesn't exist, available list of recipients is Marco,Matteo,Samuel,Simone, would you like to change the recipient ?
User : accept
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Matteo is the receiver
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Matteo
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : from which account ?
User : take money from Savings
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : what is the amount ?
User : select 200
Bot : api_call:check_amount, user_account:Savings, amount:200
API : api_response:amount_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Savings, destination_name:Matteo, amount:200
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:success
Bot : end_call transaction conducted successfully, ciao !!

API : api_response api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_balance_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response api_response:account_balance_api, api_result:success, balance:3000
Bot : end_call your current balance for account is 3000

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I want to transfer money from my Savings to Matteo
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, user_account:Savings, destination_name:Matteo
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'one or more slots are faulty'
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'availbale list of user accounts : Checkin'
Bot : It seems that you have not entered a valid account, you available accounts are Checkin, would you like change the source account ?
User : accept
Bot : from which account ?
User : Prefer the Checkin
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:destination_name_check_api, destination_name:Matteo
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of names :Marco,Samuel,Serra,Simone,Tahir'
Bot : The recipient you are trying to provide doesn't exist, available list of recipients is Marco,Samuel,Serra,Simone,Tahir, would you like to change the recipient ?
User : accept
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Marco is the receiver
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Marco
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : what is the amount ?
User : 1600 is the total
Bot : api_call:check_amount, user_account:Checkin, amount:1600
API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:5000,balance:400,max_transferable_amt:400, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'
Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 5000 and your current balance is 400 so the maximum you can transfer is 400, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call Rejected to change the decision

API : api_response:request_accounts_api, list_of_accounts:Checkin,Credit,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : I select my Savings account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_balance_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response api_response:account_balance_api, api_result:success, balance:3000
Bot : end_call your current balance for account is 3000

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Can you transfer 9000 from my Savings to Sourabh
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, user_account:Savings, destination_name:Sourabh, amount:9000
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'one or more slots are faulty'
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'availbale list of user accounts : Checkin,Credit'
Bot : It seems that you have not entered a valid account, you available accounts are Checkin,Credit, would you like change the source account ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call You denied to change the account

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Could you please transfer 1600 to Vevake
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, destination_name:Vevake, amount:1600
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : from which account ?
User : from my Credit
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:amount_check_api, user_account:Credit, amount:1600
API : api_response:amount_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Credit, destination_name:Vevake, amount:1600
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:success
Bot : end_call transaction conducted successfully, ciao !!

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?

API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Tahir is the recipient
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Tahir
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : what is the amount ?
User : select 9000
Bot : api_call:check_amount, user_account:Checkin, amount:9000
API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:1000,balance:8000,max_transferable_amt:1000, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'
Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 1000 and your current balance is 8000 so the maximum you can transfer is 1000, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call Rejected to change the decision

Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?

Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:credit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:success

User : Please use Simone
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Simone
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, list_of_destination_names:Marco,Samuel,Serra,Tahir
Bot : The recipient you provided is not registered, available list of recipients are : Marco,Samuel,Serra,Tahir, would you like to change ?
User : accept
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : I want it for Serra
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Serra
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Checkin, credit_debit:credit, destination_name:Serra
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:failed
Bot : end_call error in processing request !!

Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Sourabh is the recipient
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Sourabh
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of names :Simone,Tahir,Vevake'
Bot : The recipient you are trying to provide doesn't exist, available list of recipients is Simone,Tahir,Vevake, would you like to change the recipient ?
User : accept
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Send this money to Vevake
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Vevake
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : what is the amount ?
User : It is 200
Bot : api_call:check_amount, user_account:Credit, amount:200
API : api_response:amount_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Credit, destination_name:Vevake, amount:200
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:failed
Bot : end_call error in processing transaction

API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:success

API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Checkin, credit_debit:credit, destination_name:Marco
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:failed
Bot : end_call error in processing request !!

API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:2000,balance:3000,max_transferable_amt:2000, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'

Bot : end_call Rejected to change the decision

Bot : confirm transaction ?

Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Checkin, destination_name:Serra, amount:1200
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:success
Bot : end_call transaction conducted successfully, ciao !!

Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Checkin account please
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?
User : debit please
Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:debit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available options : credit'
Bot : It seems that you can't access that option, available options are : credit, would you like to change ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call you denied to change the option

User : It is 9000
Bot : api_call:check_amount, user_account:Credit, amount:9000
API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:2000,balance:8000,max_transferable_amt:2000, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'
Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 2000 and your current balance is 8000 so the maximum you can transfer is 2000, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : accept
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Credit, destination_name:Matteo, amount:2000
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:success
Bot : end_call transaction conducted successfully, ciao !!

Bot : end_call Denied to change account

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Can you transfer some money ?
Bot : from which account ?
User : take money from Savings
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Serra is the receiver
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Serra
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : what is the amount ?
User : 1200 euros
Bot : api_call:check_amount, user_account:Savings, amount:1200
API : api_response:amount_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call User refused to confirm transaction

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I would like to see my credit transaction history from Checkin
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check_api, user_account:Checkin, credit_debit:credit
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Credit,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : I want to use Checkin account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : Simone is the person
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Simone
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, list_of_destination_names:Marco,Tahir
Bot : The recipient you provided is not registered, available list of recipients are : Marco,Tahir, would you like to change ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call User denied to change destination name

User : <SILENCE>

API : api_response:request_accounts_api, list_of_accounts:Credit

User : I choose Savings account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of accounts : Credit'
Bot : It seems that you have not entered a valid account, you available accounts are Credit, would you like change the source account ?

Bot : which account do you want to check ?

Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_balance_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response api_response:account_balance_api, api_result:success, balance:3000
Bot : end_call your current balance for account is 3000

Bot : api_call:amount_check_api, user_account:Checkin, amount:1200

User : reject

Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Credit,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : I would like Credit account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?
User : prefer to use debit
Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:debit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : It is Tahir
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Tahir
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, list_of_destination_names:Marco,Matteo,Sourabh,Vevake
Bot : The recipient you provided is not registered, available list of recipients are : Marco,Matteo,Sourabh,Vevake, would you like to change ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call User denied to change destination name

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?

API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success

API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:2000,balance:8000,max_transferable_amt:2000, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'
Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 2000 and your current balance is 8000 so the maximum you can transfer is 2000, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?

Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : The money is for Sourabh

Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, user_account:Checkin, destination_name:Tahir, amount:200
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'one or more slots are faulty'
Bot : api_call:destination_name_check_api, destination_name:Tahir
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of names :Marco,Sourabh,Vevake'
Bot : The recipient you are trying to provide doesn't exist, available list of recipients is Marco,Sourabh,Vevake, would you like to change the recipient ?
User : accept
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Send this money to Marco
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Marco
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Checkin, destination_name:Marco, amount:200
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:failed
Bot : end_call error in processing transaction

User : Prefer the Checkin

Bot : end_call You denied to change the account

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Can I see my transaction history ?
Bot : api_call:request_accounts_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Credit,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Please use Checkin account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Credit,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Savings account please
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?
User : prefer to use credit
Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:credit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available options : debit'
Bot : It seems that you can't access that option, available options are : debit, would you like to change ?
User : accept
Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?
User : Go for debit
Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:debit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : It is Tahir
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Tahir
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, list_of_destination_names:Marco,Matteo,Simone,Vevake
Bot : The recipient you provided is not registered, available list of recipients are : Marco,Matteo,Simone,Vevake, would you like to change ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call User denied to change destination name

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Transfer 1200
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, amount:1200
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : from which account ?
User : take money from Savings
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:amount_check_api, user_account:Savings, amount:1200
API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:1000,balance:8000,max_transferable_amt:1000, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'
Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 1000 and your current balance is 8000 so the maximum you can transfer is 1000, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : accept
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Matteo is the recipient
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Matteo
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Savings, destination_name:Matteo, amount:1000
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:success
Bot : end_call transaction conducted successfully, ciao !!

Bot : The recipient you provided is not registered, available list of recipients are : Marco,Matteo,Tahir, would you like to change ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call User denied to change destination name

API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success

User : 200 is the total
Bot : api_call:check_amount, user_account:Checkin, amount:200
API : api_response:amount_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Checkin, destination_name:Tahir, amount:200
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:success
Bot : end_call transaction conducted successfully, ciao !!

Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : Samuel is the person you are looking for
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Samuel
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, list_of_destination_names:Marco,Matteo,Sourabh,Tahir,Vevake
Bot : The recipient you provided is not registered, available list of recipients are : Marco,Matteo,Sourabh,Tahir,Vevake, would you like to change ?
User : accept
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : Matteo is the person
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Matteo
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Credit, credit_debit:credit, destination_name:Matteo
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:failed
Bot : end_call error in processing request !!

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Can you transfer 800 from my Checkin to Simone
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, user_account:Checkin, destination_name:Simone, amount:800
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Checkin, destination_name:Simone, amount:800
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:success
Bot : end_call transaction conducted successfully, ciao !!

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I would like to see my debit transaction history from Savings to Sourabh
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check_api, user_account:Savings, credit_debit:debit, destination_name:Sourabh
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'one or more slots are faulty'
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of user accounts : Checkin,Credit'
Bot : It seem's that user account you provided is invalid, your available user accounts are : Checkin,Credit, would you like to change ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Credit
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit , which one do you wish ?
User : I want to use Checkin account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_destination_name_api, destination_name:Sourabh
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, list_of_destination_names:Marco,Matteo,Serra,Tahir,Vevake
Bot : The recipient you provided is not registered, available list of recipients are : Marco,Matteo,Serra,Tahir,Vevake, would you like to change ?
User : accept
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : It is Marco
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Marco
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : request for name
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Credit
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit , which one do you wish ?
User : Go for Checkin
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Checkin, credit_debit:debit, destination_name:Marco
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:failed

User : Can I see my transaction history ?
Bot : api_call:request_accounts_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : I would like Savings account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : I want to use Savings account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?
User : prefer to use debit
Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:debit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : Sourabh is the person
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Sourabh
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Savings, credit_debit:debit, destination_name:Sourabh
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:success
Bot : end_call api_call successful !!

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Please Transfer money
Bot : from which account ?
User : I select Checkin
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'availbale list of user accounts : Credit,Savings'
Bot : It seems that you have not entered a valid account, you available accounts are Credit,Savings, would you like change the source account ?
User : accept
Bot : from which account ?
User : from my Credit
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Send this money to Serra
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Serra
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of names :Marco,Matteo,Samuel,Tahir'
Bot : The recipient you are trying to provide doesn't exist, available list of recipients is Marco,Matteo,Samuel,Tahir, would you like to change the recipient ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call User failed to change the account

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Please transfer 1600 from my Checkin
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, user_account:Checkin, amount:1600
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'one or more slots are faulty'
Bot : api_call:amount_check_api, user_account:Checkin, amount:1600
API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:1000,balance:3000,max_transferable_amt:1000, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'
Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 1000 and your current balance is 3000 so the maximum you can transfer is 1000, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : accept
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Send it to the account of Sourabh
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Sourabh
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Checkin, destination_name:Sourabh, amount:1000
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:success
Bot : end_call transaction conducted successfully, ciao !!

Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_balance_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response api_response:account_balance_api, api_result:success, balance:400
Bot : end_call your current balance for account is 400

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Show me my account balance
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_accounts_api, list_of_accounts:Credit,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Prefer Savings account

API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success

API : api_response api_response:account_balance_api, api_result:failed
Bot : end_call error in processing request !!

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I want to transfer money from my Credit to Serra
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, user_account:Credit, destination_name:Serra
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : what is the amount ?
User : It is 2400
Bot : api_call:check_amount, user_account:Credit, amount:2400
API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:1000,balance:8000,max_transferable_amt:1000, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'
Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 1000 and your current balance is 8000 so the maximum you can transfer is 1000, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : accept
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Credit, destination_name:Serra, amount:1000
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:failed
Bot : end_call error in processing transaction

API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Credit,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : I would like Checkin account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Checkin, credit_debit:credit, destination_name:Samuel
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:success
Bot : end_call api_call successful !!

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Please transfer 2400 from my Credit
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, user_account:Credit, amount:2400
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'one or more slots are faulty'
Bot : api_call:amount_check_api, user_account:Credit, amount:2400
API : api_response:amount_check_api, limit:2000,balance:3000,max_transferable_amt:2000, message:'change to max_transferable_amt ?'
Bot : It seems the amount you provided can't be processed because your transaction limit is 2000 and your current balance is 3000 so the maximum you can transfer is 2000, would you like to reduce your amount to this amount ?
User : accept
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : The money is for Samuel
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Samuel
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Credit, destination_name:Samuel, amount:2000
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:success
Bot : end_call transaction conducted successfully, ciao !!

API : api_response:request_accounts_api, list_of_accounts:Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : How about my Checkin account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of accounts : Savings'
Bot : It seems that you have not entered a valid account, you available accounts are Savings, would you like change the source account ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call Denied to change account

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I want to see my account balance ?
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_accounts_api, list_of_accounts:Checkin,Credit
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit , which one do you wish ?
User : I choose Checkin account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_balance_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response api_response:account_balance_api, api_result:success, balance:400
Bot : end_call your current balance for account is 400

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Send Money
Bot : from which account ?
User : from my Checkin
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Simone is the recipient
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Simone
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of names :Sourabh'
Bot : The recipient you are trying to provide doesn't exist, available list of recipients is Sourabh, would you like to change the recipient ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call User failed to change the account

User : <SILENCE>

API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of user accounts : Credit,Savings'
Bot : It seem's that user account you provided is invalid, your available user accounts are : Credit,Savings, would you like to change ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call you denied to change the account

Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Can you transfer 800 from my Credit to Serra
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, user_account:Credit, destination_name:Serra, amount:800

Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'availbale list of user accounts : Checkin,Savings'
Bot : It seems that you have not entered a valid account, you available accounts are Checkin,Savings, would you like change the source account ?
User : accept
Bot : from which account ?
User : use the Checkin for the transaction
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success

API : api_response:amount_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call User refused to confirm transaction

API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success

Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?

Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:credit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : I want it for Samuel
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Samuel
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, list_of_destination_names:Matteo,Vevake
Bot : The recipient you provided is not registered, available list of recipients are : Matteo,Vevake, would you like to change ?
User : accept
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : Serra is the person
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Serra
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, list_of_destination_names:Matteo,Vevake
Bot : The recipient you provided is not registered, available list of recipients are : Matteo,Vevake, would you like to change ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call User denied to change destination name

User : I would like to know my account balance for Credit
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, user_account:Credit
API : api_response api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_balance_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response api_response:account_balance_api, api_result:success, balance:1300
Bot : end_call your current balance for account is 1300

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Transfer money please
Bot : from which account ?
User : use the Checkin for the transaction
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Send it to the account of Simone
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Simone
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of names :Sourabh'
Bot : The recipient you are trying to provide doesn't exist, available list of recipients is Sourabh, would you like to change the recipient ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call User failed to change the account

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : I would like to see my transaction history from Checkin to Marco
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check_api, user_account:Checkin, destination_name:Marco
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'one or more slots are faulty'
Bot : api_call:check_destination_name_api, destination_name:Marco
API : api_response:destination_check_api, api_result:failed, list_of_destination_names:Tahir,Vevake
Bot : The recipient you provided is not registered, available list of recipients are : Tahir,Vevake, would you like to change ?
User : accept
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : I want it for Tahir
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Tahir
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_destination_name_api, destination_name:Marco
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : request for name
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Credit,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Please use Savings account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?
User : debit please
Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:debit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Savings, credit_debit:debit, destination_name:Tahir
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:success
Bot : end_call api_call successful !!

User : <SILENCE>

Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available list of accounts : Checkin,Savings'

API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success

API : api_response api_response:account_balance_api, api_result:failed

Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Please select my Credit account
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:check_balance_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response api_response:account_balance_api, api_result:success, balance:3000
Bot : end_call your current balance for account is 3000

User : take money from Checkin

Bot : from which account ?
User : take money from Credit

API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : who is the recipient ?
User : Send this money to Matteo

User : reject
Bot : end_call User failed to change the account

API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?
User : prefer to use debit
Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:debit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'available options : credit'
Bot : It seems that you can't access that option, available options are : credit, would you like to change ?
User : reject
Bot : end_call you denied to change the option

User : <SILENCE>
Bot : how can i help you today ?
User : Send money from Credit
Bot : api_call:initial_slot_check, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:initial_slot_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'one or more slots are faulty'
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Credit
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'availbale list of user accounts : Savings'
Bot : It seems that you have not entered a valid account, you available accounts are Savings, would you like change the source account ?
User : accept
Bot : from which account ?
User : Prefer the Checkin
Bot : api_call:account_check_api, user_account:Checkin
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:failed, message:'availbale list of user accounts : Savings'
Bot : It seems that you have not entered a valid account, you available accounts are Savings, would you like change the source account ?

API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Credit,Savings

API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:request_account_api
API : api_response:request_account_api, list_of_accounts: Checkin,Credit,Savings
Bot : You have the following accounts : Checkin,Credit,Savings , which one do you wish ?
User : Savings account please
Bot : api_call:check_account_api, user_account:Savings
API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : which information should I give credit or debit ?
User : prefer to use debit
Bot : api_call:check_credit_debit_api, credit_debit:debit
API : api_response:credit_debit_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : can I ask what is the name of the partner ?
User : Simone is the person
Bot : api_call:destination_check_api, destination_name:Simone
API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : api_call:transaction_history_api, user_account:Savings, credit_debit:debit, destination_name:Simone
API : api_response:transaction_history_api, api_result:success
Bot : end_call api_call successful !!

API : api_response:account_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : who is the recipient ?

API : api_response:destination_name_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : what is the amount ?
User : select 200
Bot : api_call:check_amount, user_account:Checkin, amount:200
API : api_response:amount_check_api, api_result:success
Bot : confirm transaction ?
User : accept
Bot : api_call:transaction_api, user_account:Checkin, destination_name:Samuel, amount:200
API : api_response:api_call, api_result:failed
Bot : end_call error in processing transaction
